member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources
member.summary: Defines constants that identify external resources used in tests.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure
member.summary: Defines constants that identity Windows Azure resources.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.AzureAuthorityServer
member.summary: The address of the Azure Active Directory that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.ClassicTableStorageConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the classic table storage that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.CosmosDbTableStorageConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the CosmosDb table storage that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultUrl
member.summary: The URL of the Key Value that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultSecretName
member.summary: The name of one secret stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultKeyName
member.summary: The name of one key stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultCertificateName
member.summary: The name of one certificate stored in the key vault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultClientApplicationId
member.summary: The application id of the client application that is being used to communicate with the key vault used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultClientApplicationKey
member.summary: The application key of the client application that is being used to communicate with the key vault used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.KeyVaultResourceName
member.summary: The name of the resource (OAuth) to access the KeyVault that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.AppInsightsInstrumentationKey
member.summary: The instrumentation key for the Application Insights that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.RedisCacheConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the REDIS cache that should be used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.SearchServiceName
member.summary: The name of the Azure Search service used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.SearchServiceApiKey
member.summary: The API key of the Azure Search service used in tests.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.ExternalTestResources.Azure.ServiceBusConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string to the service Bus instance that should be used in tests.

member.summary: Defines constants that identity authority servers.

member.summary: The base address of Identity Server (staging) (HTTP).

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer
member.summary: Provides a test server that hosts an instance of Identity Server that can be used for integration testing.
member.remarks: This test server allows configuring the API resources, clients, etc. to emulate the authentication/authorization flows.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.TestServer
member.summary: Gets the instance.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.ServiceProvider
member.summary: Gets the service provider.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The identity resources that should be configured. Optional.
The API resources that should be configured. Optional.
The clients that should be configured. Optional.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application configuration. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application services. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.Build
member.summary: Builds the Identity test server.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.ConfigureAppConfiguration(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder)
member.summary: Executes the test server standard logic to configure the application configuration.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Executes the test server standard logic to configure the application services.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderContext,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Executes the test server standard logic to configure the application.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.AddIdentityResources
member.summary: Adds the identity resources to the Identity Server in-memory store.
member.returns: The identity resources that will be added to the Identity Server in-memory store.

member.summary: Adds the API resources to the Identity Server in-memory store.
member.returns: The API resources that will be added to the Identity Server in-memory store.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.IdentityServer.IdentityTestServer.AddClients
member.summary: Adds the clients to the Identity Server in-memory store.
member.returns: The clients that will be added to the Identity Server in-memory store.
